Here is a list of all struct and union fields with links to the structures/unions they belong to:

- h -

  • h : HSBtuple, HSLtuple, VPoint
  • handleProcs : PISelectionParams, PIPickerParams, FormatRecord, FilterRecord, ExportRecord, AcquireRecord
  • handleProcsVersion : HandleProcs
  • HandleToDescriptor : PSActionDescriptorProcs
  • HasDoubleByteInString : PSGetFileListSuite6, PSGetFileListSuite5, PSGetFileListSuite4, PSGetFileListSuite3
  • hasImageScrap : FilterRecord
  • HasKey : PSActionDescriptorProcs
  • HasKeys : PSActionDescriptorProcs
  • haveMask : FilterRecord
  • hiPlane : FormatRecord, ExportRecord, AcquireRecord
  • hostDisposeHdl : FormatRecord
  • hostInSecondaryThread : FormatRecord
  • hostModes : FormatRecord, AcquireRecord
  • hostNewHdl : FormatRecord
  • hostProc : PISelectionParams, PIPickerParams, FormatRecord, FilterRecord, ExportRecord, AcquireRecord
  • hostSig : PISelectionParams, PIPickerParams, FormatRecord, FilterRecord, ExportRecord, AcquireRecord
  • HostSupports32BitCoordinates : FormatRecord, ExportRecord, AcquireRecord
  • hResolution : ReadImageDocumentDesc
